Key Match Events: LeBron James and Anthony Davis combined for 63 points, with 30 of them in the fourth quarter.
The Lakers opened the fourth quarter on a 21-0 scoring run, including 16 points from LeBron James.
LeBron James finished with a triple-double of 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists.
Anthony Davis scored 31 points with nine rebounds, three steals, and two blocked shots.
Domantas Sabonis had a triple-double of 29 points, 12 rebounds, and 10 assists for the Kings.
De'Aaron Fox contributed 28 points and 10 assists for the Kings.
DeMar DeRozan scored 23 points for the Kings.
